sentences.sContent: And historically they acted with that sense of stewardship in mind, thinking of what was appropriate for the whole system and not simply for their firm.
sentences.sContent_eng: And historically they acted with that sense of stewardship in mind, thinking of what was appropriate for the whole system and not simply for their firm.
sentences.sCn: 而且在历史上，他们也在心目中带有那种使命感，思考的是什么对这个社会是最好的，不仅仅是对自己的公司。

sentences.sContent: After all, historically, the two nations have been enemies.
sentences.sContent_eng: After all, historically, the two nations have been enemies.
sentences.sCn: 毕竟在历史上，两个国家曾经是敌人。

sentences.sContent: Because historically, we have not defined marriage in our constitution.
sentences.sContent_eng: Because historically, we have not defined marriage in our constitution.
sentences.sCn: 因为历史上我们从未在宪法中给婚姻下过定义。

words.tran: 历史的；史学的；基于史实的
有历史意义的；历史上著名的
历史，历史学；历史记录；来历
